titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 and the Small Business Act to expand the availability of employee stock ownership plans in S corporations, and for other purposes.
Promotion and Expansion of Private Employee Ownership Act of 2019
Promotion and Expansion of Private Employee Ownership Act of 2019
Promotion and Expansion of Private Employee Ownership Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Ways and Means, and in addition to the Committees on Education and Labor, and Small Business, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
